decisions.decision: SCF positioning strategy: Market as 'AGENTS.md Plus Intelligence'
decisions.rationale: Analysis shows SCF provides persistent context continuity that agents.md (static) and AG2 (ephemeral) both lack
decisions.context: Competitive analysis of agents.md and AG2.ai frameworks

decisions.decision: Add AGENTS.md symlink for ecosystem compatibility
decisions.rationale: 20,000+ projects use agents.md standard - symlink provides compatibility without complexity
decisions.context: Need to research what tools actually detect AGENTS.md files

decisions.decision: Implement AGENTS.md generator and auto-symlink in SCF
decisions.rationale: Research confirms Zed, Aider, Cursor, and many tools scan for AGENTS.md - provides immediate ecosystem compatibility
decisions.context: Tools detected: Zed (8 filenames), Aider (--read), Cursor (.cursorrules), Gemini CLI, GitHub Copilot

decisions.decision: Create dedicated init_scf.py and update_scf.py for precise project control
decisions.rationale: Need targeted, one-project-at-a-time operations separate from ecosystem-wide learner. Certainty over what's being changed.
decisions.context: User wants explicit control over which project receives updates vs automatic discovery

decisions.decision: Add SCF productivity analytics and growth tracking
decisions.rationale: Measure logarithmic growth in productivity, context efficiency, and innovation velocity to validate SCF impact
decisions.context: Track: session efficiency, context reuse, cross-project learning adoption, time-to-implementation

decisions.decision: Make session portability a core SCF tenant
decisions.rationale: Network issues, token limits, and interruptions shouldn't kill momentum. SCF enables seamless LLM switching and session resume.
decisions.context: Core principle: Never lose progress. SESSION_RESUME.md + buildstate = perfect continuity across any interruption or LLM

decisions.decision: Create SCF Knowledge Base for tracking external frameworks
decisions.rationale: Continuous learning from agents.md, AG2, Cursor, Zed, Aider. Monthly checks for updates, quarterly deep dives.
decisions.context: KB tracks: versions, features, integration opportunities, competitive positioning. Next check: 2025-12-10

decisions.rationale: Need complete guide showing how AIs coordinate across sessions without external scripts - intelligence in files themselves
decisions.context: Created SELF_AWARE_BUILDSTATE.md with protocol, examples, API reference, CLI reference, best practices, troubleshooting. Updated README.md with new section.

decisions.decision: Self-aware buildstate with session state tracking (IMPLEMENTED)
decisions.rationale: Buildstate should detect when another LLM modified the project without needing external SCF scripts. Intelligence in files, not tooling.
decisions.context: Complete: _session_state tracking, embedded AI instructions in buildstate.md READ FIRST section, check_session_state(), update_session_state(), generate_self_aware_context(), scf_load_project.py --self-aware mode. Validated with Claudeâ†’Copilot cross-AI test showing automatic review trigger. Full documentation in SELF_AWARE_BUILDSTATE.md.

decisions.decision: Add "Save Often" and "Public/Private Distinction" as core tenants
decisions.rationale: User identified critical needs: atomic commits (like homework), public repo fork with private data protection, community learnings without exposing secrets
decisions.context: Industry pattern: Atomic Commits (Git best practice). Added conversation history tracking and SCF metadata tracking. Commit: 472cd8a

decisions.decision: Add comprehensive User Acceptance Tests section to README
decisions.rationale: Highlight SCF powerful functionality through real-world scenarios that demonstrate competitive advantages
decisions.context: 8 UATs covering: Cross-AI handoff, session resume, ecosystem learning, inheritance, change notifications, Copilot integration, rebalancing, private fork strategy. Commit: 0a9efe6
